name: Eternal Flame
description:
A short snowy platformer about a character looking to hibernate with his clan at the eternal flame. In this game you are tasked with completing a series of trials where you take on bullet hell style enemies while protecting the flame that keeps you alive. 

This was originally created for the epic mega jam but  I was not able to dedicate enough time to it to meet the deadline. 

(USING A CONTROLLER IS HEAVILY SUGGESTED) 

Takes roughly 20 minutes to complete
